query: SELECT w.id, w.slug, w.eventId, e.title, e.coupleName1, e.coupleName2, COUNT(g.id) as guest_count FROM weddingWebsites w LEFT JOIN events e ON w.eventId = e.id LEFT JOIN guests g ON e.id = g.eventId WHERE w.slug = 'louisren' GROUP BY w.id, w.slug, w.eventId, e.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2PMnkMFrZnXtRMs.8c3e75715602 --database CmoCN8ea9H2wev4kGq2LWy --execute SELECT w.id, w.slug, w.eventId, e.title, e.coupleName1, e.coupleName2, COUNT(g.id) as guest_count FROM weddingWebsites w LEFT JOIN events e ON w.eventId = e.id LEFT JOIN guests g ON e.id = g.eventId WHERE w.slug = 'louisren' GROUP BY w.id, w.slug, w.eventId, e.id;
